title: Allah is in front of us when we are praying so what about the Jamah that is in front? Assim AlHakeem
transcript: i'm done from the us yes sir i have a question about the foil like we know that in when you do our salad is in front of us but what about gemma okay yeah that's what i'm saying so what what is the problem allah is in front of the jamaa allah is in front of each person who is praying whether one or a billion whether they are in saudi arabia or in india or in canada or in the us or in japan this is something that we cannot comprehend with our minds because we cannot even imagine allah we have to believe in it as it is and it's true you
